entry.title: Getting Started with Capture The Flag (CTF) in Cybersecurity

link.title: Getting Started with Capture The Flag (CTF) in Cybersecurity

entry.summary: What is CTF? Capture The Flag (CTF) is a cybersecurity competition where participants solve challenges to find hidden strings called ‚Äúflags‚Äù (e.g., CTF{you_found_me}). It is a fun and educational way to learn about hacking, security vulnerabilities, cryptography, and forensics. Types of CTF Competitions CTF competitions usually come in three main formats: 1.
